The rise of streaming may have cut into the record viewership of four years ago. Fox News led all networks in audience size, Nielsen said.

Both Parties Fret as More Democrats Request Mail Ballots in Key StatesRepublicans fear that President Trump’s rhetoric could depress turnout. But Democrats worry an overreliance on the mail could be damaging as well.
Voting by Mail Tops Election MisinformationMisleading information about voting by mail is by far the biggest category of election falsehoods — and it includes many flavors.

Study Finds Trump Is ‘Single Largest Driver’ of Virus MisinformationThe most prevalent falsehoods were about “miracle cures,” including President Trump’s promotion of anti-malarial drugs and disinfectants.
Indoor dining has returned to New York City, but will it be enough to save restaurants?
The Election Is Making Investors NervousThe stock market has been on a tear for much of 2020, but there is now more volatility as investors worry about the outcome of the presidential vote.
